titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the postponement of certain deadlines by reason of significant fires.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit the postponement of certain deadlines by reason of significant fires.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill allows the postponement of certain tax deadlines due to significant fires for which assistance is provided under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act.
